## PickBy type

Pick all properties of given type in object type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type PickProperties<T, P> = Pick<
  T,
  {
    [K in keyof T]: T[K] extends P ? K : never;
  }[keyof T]
>;
```
